text:
[Verse]
Wake up light on me
Sunshine through the trees
Chasing all my dreams
Breeze in the morning

[Verse 2]
Running by the sea
Laughing wild and free
Hopes up to the sky
Feeling like I can fly

[Chorus]
Oh we glow we shine
In this moment so fine
All our worries behind
Dancing in the sunshine

[Verse 3]
Hearts are beating fast
Joy that's made to last
Living for today
Catch the rays let's play

[Chorus]
Oh we glow we shine
In this moment so fine
All our worries behind
Dancing in the sunshine

[Bridge]
Feel the rhythm of the waves
Hear the music nature plays
Let the magic take its place
Smile across your face
title: Sunshine Dreams
